children.value: The MakerDAO Core Community Development Initiative supports both virtual and physical meetups.
We fund meetups worldwide that support introducing newcomers to the blockchain, Ethereum, DeFi, and MakerDAO.
Since February 2018, Maker's Grant Program has distributed over 40,000 Dai to 100+ meetups in 33 countries supporting more than 5,600 attendees.
Looking to fund a larger event?
Whether this is your first meetup or if you're an experienced organizer, please follow the steps below to apply for funding.
After submitting your application, please allow three to five business days for a response.
You’ll need an invoice link to include in the application form.
This form gives us the information we'll need to decide on your funding request.
Please note, whether you're collecting additional sponsorship money from another organization, or if you plan to charge an entry fee.
Email responses will inform applicants of their applications' status, regardless of whether it is accepted or rejected.
For help preparing your meetup and answering the questions in the form, please check out our hosting guides:
The basics for hosting a meetup. Start here if it’s your first time hosting.
How to choose the best format for your meetup based on your audience.
How to budget effectively to make the most of the meetup costs.
How and where to promote your meetup.
If we fund your meetup, we’ll ask you to speak briefly about Community Development at MakerDAO.
Outline the different ways to contribute to MakerDAO.
Mention that Dai bounty awards vary by type of contribution.
Record and upload presentations to provide a helpful resource for others.
Please fill out our Feedback Form. It helps us track metrics and document the media and resources produced for these events.
Grantees who do not fill out this form will not be eligible for future funding.
for help planning a successful meetup.

export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Meetup Funding","order":1,"hideLanguageSelector":true,"keywords":"meetup, meetups, event, events, grant, microgrant, program, help, local","description":"How MakerDAO supports meetups and events"}

}; const StatusBanner = makeShortcode("StatusBanner"); const Flex = makeShortcode("Flex"); const TDStat = makeShortcode("TDStat"); const Box = makeShortcode("Box"); const Aligner = makeShortcode("Aligner"); const Button = makeShortcode("Button"); const Tout = makeShortcode("Tout"); const List = makeShortcode("List"); const Process = makeShortcode("Process"); const Callout = makeShortcode("Callout"); const Link = makeShortcode("Link"); const Checklist = makeShortcode("Checklist"); const layoutProps = { _frontmatter }; const MDXLayout = "wrapper" export default function MDXContent({ components, ...props }) { return

{`We are currently funding `}{`virtual meetups only`}{`.`}

{`Meetup Funding`}

{`The MakerDAO Core Community Development Initiative supports both virtual and physical meetups. `}

Dai

{`Awarded`}

 Dai

{`Dispersed`}

 Average

{`Dai Award`}

 Grant Applications

{`Submitted`}

{`We fund meetups worldwide that support introducing newcomers to the blockchain, Ethereum, DeFi, and MakerDAO.`}

{`Since February 2018, Maker's Grant Program has distributed over 40,000 Dai to 100+ meetups in 33 countries supporting more than 5,600 attendees.`}

{`What We Do Fund`}

{`Honorarium for Organizers and Speakers`}

{`Space Rentals`}

{`Equipment Rentals`}

{`Food | Drinks`}

{`What We Don't Fund`}

{`Alcoholic Beverages | Bar Tabs`}

{`Burner Wallet Speakeasy Events`}

{`Dai | xDai Airdrops`}

{`Banners | T-shirts | Paid Marketing`}

{`Get Funded`}

{`Looking to fund a larger event?`}

{`Reach out to us at: `}{`events@makerdao.com`}

{`Whether this is your first meetup or if you're an experienced organizer, please follow the steps below to apply for funding.`}

{`After submitting your application, please allow three to five business days for a response.`}

{`Create an Invoice`}

{`You’ll need an invoice link to include in the application form.`}

{`You’ll need the payer address: `}{`0xF563f100df419CCDe59BFBE0692fc4c5bFe01706`}

{`Create a Request Network Invoice`}

{`Submit an Application`}

{`This form gives us the information we'll need to decide on your funding request.`}

{`Please note, whether you're collecting additional sponsorship money from another organization, or if you plan to charge an entry fee.`}

{`Application Form`}

{`Email responses will inform applicants of their applications' status, regardless of whether it is accepted or rejected.`}

{`For help preparing your meetup and answering the questions in the form, please check out our hosting guides:`}

{`Getting Started`}

{`The basics for hosting a meetup. Start here if it’s your first time hosting.`}

{`Event Format`}

{`How to choose the best format for your meetup based on your audience.`}

{`Budget`}

{`How to budget effectively to make the most of the meetup costs.`}

{`Promotion`}

{`How and where to promote your meetup.`}

{`During the Event`}

{`If we fund your meetup, we’ll ask you to speak briefly about Community Development at MakerDAO.`}

{`Direct new users to the `}{`Community Portal.`}

{`Outline the different ways to contribute to MakerDAO.`}

{`Mention that Dai bounty awards vary by type of contribution.`}

{`Record and upload presentations to provide a helpful resource for others.`}

{`After the Event`}

{`Please fill out our Feedback Form. It helps us track metrics and document the media and resources produced for these events.`}

{`Feedback Form`}

{`Grantees who do not fill out this form will not be eligible for future funding.`}

{`Support`}

{`Check out our `}{`Community Guides`}{` for help planning a successful meetup.`}

{`Reach out to `}{`meetups@makerdao.com`}{` for more information.`}

{`Ask us questions in our `}{`Community Chat.`}
